name: Crackers Revenge
overview: Digital Marketing PD #028, Stonysoft #0160, a Son of Blagger Clone where all crackers have been caught by the cruel software-firms, and your mission is to find 6 keys, and rescue the crackers. You may not touch the flowers and the mines. Press spacebar to die. You get the bonus every time you take a key. Published in Italy in Supplementi Edigamma/pubblirome - super top (1986) and in Super Game 2000 n.8 (Ottobre 1985).
